revised_title: Theobald Smith: A Pioneering Figure in Bacteriology and Pathology
tldr: Theobald Smith was a prominent figure in the fields of bacteriology, pathology, and protozoology. He made significant contributions to the understanding of infectious diseases, immunity, and the role of bacteria and protozoa in causing diseases in animals. His work on Texas fever, diphtheria, and black-head disease in turkeys has had a lasting impact on the field of veterinary science and medicine.
